title: Agrawas
author: Agrawas
content: Looking to sell few DENARIUM .01BTC Loaded Coins in MINT Condition. Please DM me if interested?Pics below - Only 10 Available.https://imgur.com/a/T4hv8TwI am looking for .0225BTC each but if you buy more, I can do a some discount.Buy all 10 for .2BTC

comments.author: UniJoin
comments.body: Question. If we were to purchase all of the few coins (we would like to have a raffle for our users).Then you could take care of the delivery? (in the sense that it makes no sense to send them to us and then resend the coins to the winners).

comments.author: Agrawas
comments.body: Quote from: UniJoin on July 19, 2023, 03:05:29 PMQuestion. If we were to purchase all of the few coins (we would like to have a raffle for our users).Then you could take care of the delivery? (in the sense that it makes no sense to send them to us and then resend the coins to the winners).Yup, that can be arranged.. DM me with details and we can work out something.Thanks

comments.author: UniJoin
comments.body: Quote from: Agrawas on July 19, 2023, 03:14:43 PMYup, that can be arranged.. DM me with details and we can work out something.ThanksThanks, I saw your PM.I will discuss the feasibility of such a purchase with a colleague and return if approved.
